description: Try our easy to follow Pear Smoothie Cubes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Summer,Pear,Banana,Halal,High fibre,High protein,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Pear Smoothie Cubes Recipe | Woolworths

HowToTip.tipText:
Prep time : 5 mins
Freezing time : 4 hours

recipeInstructions.text: Place pear, bananas and cinnamon in a blender and blitz until smooth. Spoon mixture into ice cube trays and freeze for 4 hours or until set.

HowToTip.tipText: To make one smoothie, fill blender with a quarter of the fruit ice cubes, 1 cup of milk and 30g rolled oat, then blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer smoothie cubes to an airtight container and freeze.
